problem_text_cn: 如图,▱ABCD的面积是8,对角线AC、DB交于点O,EF过点O分别交AD、BC于E、F,则阴影部分的面积是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the area of ​​▱ABCD is N_0, the diagonal AC and DB intersect at point O, and EF crosses AD, BC at E, and F respectively, then the area of ​​the shaded part is ()
raw_answer: 解:∵四边形ABCD是平行四边形,∴OB=OD,∠FBO=∠EDO．在△OFB与△OED中≥ft\{\begin{matrix}∠FBO=∠EDO\\OB=OD\\∠FOB=∠EOD\\\end{matrix}\right.\,∴△FBO≌△EDO,∴S~阴影部分~=S~△BOC~=\frac{1}{4}S~▱ABCD~=\frac{1}{4}×8=2．故选:B．
raw_comment: 本题主要考查了平行四边形的性质以及全等三角形的判定,并通过此题让学生明白求阴影部分的面积一般的思路是将不规则的阴影部分转化为规则的几何图形求解．
